casebody.data:
2001-2966 (La. 10/14/02)

STATE of Louisiana v. Albert LORIO. No. 2001-KO-2966. Supreme Court of Louisiana. Oct. 14, 2002.

*415In re Lorio, Albert;—Defendant; Applying for Writ of Certiorari and/or Review, Parish of Orleans, Criminal District Court Div. A, No. 409-002; to the Court of Appeal, Fourth Circuit, No. 2001-KA-0219.

Denied.
